sourcesContent:
• How It Works
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Contact Us
  • Login
  • Sign Up
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { // isLoggedIn = false ; constructor( private router: Router){} ngOnInit(){ // const token= localStorage.getItem('token'); // if (token) { // this.isLoggedIn = true ; // } } toAbout(){ const aboutSection = document.getElementById("about-us"); if (aboutSection) { aboutSection.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); } } toProduct(){ const aboutSection = document.getElementById("products"); if (aboutSection) { aboutSection.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); } } toContact(){ const aboutSection = document.getElementById("contact-us"); if (aboutSection) { aboutSection.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); } } logout(){ localStorage.removeItem('token'); this.isLoggedIn=false ; this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
